Ingredients.11: 2 tablespoons heavy cream, or as needed

Directions.1: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with a silicone mat or parchment paper.

Directions.2: Mix flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, and baking soda together in a large bowl.

Directions.3: Grate in 1/3 of the butter using the large holes of a box grater. Toss lightly with your fingertips until coated with flour. Repeat twice more with remaining butter.

Directions.4: Whisk 1/2 cup cream, egg, and rose water together in a small bowl with a fork. Pour over the flour-butter mixture. Mix with a fork just until large clumps of dough form. Gently mix in raspberries.

Directions.5: Turn dough out onto a lightly floured surface. Bring together and gently pat into a round about 3/4-inch thick. Cut into 8 wedges with a sharp knife.

Directions.6: Arrange wedges on the baking sheet. Brush tops with 2 tablespoons cream and sprinkle with raspberry sugar.

Directions.7: Bake in the preheated oven until golden, about 15 minutes. Let cool for 5 to 10 minutes before serving.
